title: Ep 419 | Jase Almost Gets Sued for 'Scaring' a Woman & Runs Through the 10 Most Ridiculous Lawsuits
description:
Jase reads from a list of the top 10 frivolous lawsuits, and Phil rebuts with a scripture. Al reminds Jase of the time a woman tried to sue him because she was frightened by a poster. Phil and Al talk about the basic human desires that get mankind into trouble, and Phil asks his sons if they have ever brought a dispute before the ungodly to settle it for them.
Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
